title: LISTEN: The Debate podcast - Dennis Wise and Craig Bellamy
description: Listen back to the latest edition of The Debate as Dennis Wise and Craig Bellamy joined Geoff Shreeves to discuss the big football talking points.
content: Following Ryan Giggs' appointment as the new manager of Wales, Bellamy, who was also interviewed for the job, and Wise discuss the Manchester United legend's suitability for the role.The panel then turn their attentions to the failed Newcastle takeover, Andy Carroll's proposed move to Chelsea, Jose Mourinho's potential new contract at United and Ronaldinho's legacy following his retirement.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
